  • Legacy
  • View page source

Legacy

The sweetpea module exports other names for historical reasons, but they should not be used in new program.

sweetpea.fully_cross_block()

Use sweetpea.CrossBlock().

sweetpea.multiple_cross_block()

Use sweetpea.MultiCrossBlock().

sweetpea.simplify_experiments()

Use sweetpea.experiments_to_tuples().

sweetpea.experiment_to_csv()

Use sweetpea.same_experiments_csv().

sweetpea.synthesize_trials_uniform()

Use sweetpea.synthesize_trials() with UniGen.

sweetpea.synthesize_trials_non_uniform()

Use sweetpea.synthesize_trials() with IterateGen.

class sweetpea.SimpleLevel

Use sweetpea.Level.

class sweetpea.DerivationWindow

Use sweetpea.Window.

class sweetpea.WithinTrialDerivationWindow

Use sweetpea.WithinTrial.

class sweetpea.TransitionDerivationWindow

Use sweetpea.Transition.

sweetpea.exclude()

Use sweetpea.Exclude().

sweetpea.minimum_trials()

Use sweetpea.MinimumTrials().

sweetpea.at_most_k_in_a_row()

Use sweetpea.AtMostKInARow().

sweetpea.at_least_k_in_a_row()

Use sweetpea.AtLeastKInARow().

sweetpea.exactly_k_in_a_row()

Use sweetpea.ExactlyKInARow().

class sweetpea.UnigenSamplingStrategy

Use sweetpea.UniGen.

class sweetpea.NonUniformSamplingStrategy

Use sweetpea.IterateGen.

class sweetpea.UniformCombinatoricSamplingStrategy

Use sweetpea.RandomGen.
